website_summaries.verdict: Skyrim is still a rock-solid RPG that's worth purchasing if you missed vanilla Skyrim. That said, if you already own and mod the original game, Skyrim Special Edition has nothing fresh to offer.
pros: Offers dozens of hours of open-world adventuring
Boasts improved stability and subtle graphics improvements
Lore-heavy universe is immersive and fascinating
cons: Skyrim Special Edition doesn't offer anything PC players didn't already have via the modding community
64-bit support limits mod accessibility, crippling the greatest appeal for playing Skyrim on PC

customer_reviews.title: First PC game that has held my interest in years
customer_reviews.text: I never played any of this series, my Grandson was playing it and recommended this edition so I bought the download from Amazon. I like this game very much. I do save my game (And often, which is always a good idea) and get advice sometimes on line and luckily there is plenty of it out there. This Special Edition is massive and immersive and the graphics are fantastic ( I think the graphics is why this is called Special Edition). There is so much to see and a lot of quests. All I can say is I'm enjoying it! Oh yeah, and my Grandson tipped me off to the best Mods!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Guy

customer_reviews.title: Warning: You may become obsessed with this game
customer_reviews.text: This game is just great. I have put 200 hours into this game and am still discovering new locations and quests every time I play. It is an open world RPG with loads of options for gameplay and combat style. The world is massive, and the included DLCs are all great expansions including new locations, characters, and quests. It reminds me of an MMO minus the people and the ghastly load times. This is a must have for every gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: The video card requirements were not clear. They system keeps kicking me out and crashes completely.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin Parke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was only going to play for a few hours next thing i know the sun was out.
customer_reviews.author: William Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy to download
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to download. I'll walk you through it right now. First you buy the game and then you go to your online game and library place where it tells you to go. Then you copy the numbers/letters next to "Steam RDM" and then you go to steam, games, activate a product, and paste the product code in and hit finish and you are good. Hope this helped some of you
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: this is a STEAM game. It is not a ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a STEAM game. It is not a direct PC download, and this will not work on my machine. I already bought another version from steam and have to get a refund because it just doesn't work and is buggy. the advertisement said nothing about steam until after you purchased the game.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this game you better have a duel monitor setup so you can have ...
customer_reviews.text: This game has so many bugs still in it it's embarrassing for Bethesda. Just another game company doing a money grab by re-releasing a game with a few quick upgrades but no real game improvements. If you buy this game you better have a duel monitor setup so you can have the game on one monitor and a help site on the other monitor because you will need the programing codes to enter into the console so you can get quests to clear. If entering special codes into a game constantly to get it to advance is not your thing then avoid this game.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: WARNING READ BEFORE BUYING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING this game is for 64 bit pc or laptop please check what system you have before buying by going to start menu in bottom left corner and going to control panel then go to system if your system is 34 bit this wont launch and there are no refunds.....I found out the hard way : (
customer_reviews.author: Christy Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Unable to download game after hours of trying
customer_reviews.text: I also bought the game and after spending hours trying to download I gave up and asked for a refund. I can download books with one click but this game had me jumping so many hoops with different software, which did not work correctly. My advice find a vender to sell you the disks
customer_reviews.author: DG Gray

customer_reviews.title: The game is a 6, but the download experience ...
customer_reviews.text: The game is a 6, but the download experience is ridiculous, and that is an Amazon item. Been working on downloading Steam and looking for codes for about 2 hours now. Kind of wish I had not started the process... I could have spent the 2 hours doing something enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Game is really good to.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what the other guys are talking about but it took me 30 seconds at most to activate the code on steam.Game is really good to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Endless possibilities
customer_reviews.text: Game is expansive in its world and exploring can be fun and tedious at the same time, but keeps me wanting to start it up and stay on for a long while. One problem that I can't knock off a star for though - I can't play it as much as I would like because my girlfriend gets upset that I spend too much time on it, so i have stopped playing for awhile. Will start again!
customer_reviews.author: Bribri

product_meta.title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Special Edition [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail. The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features like remastered art and effects, volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, screen-space reflections, and more. Skyrim Special Edition also brings the power of mods to the PC, Xbox One and Playstation 4.
PC Minimum System Requirements:PC Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
 * RAM: 8 GB
 * Hard Disk: 60 GB
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7970 3GB
 * Supported OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 7

 * Processor: Intel Core i7-4770/AMD FX-8350
 * RAM: 16 GB
 * Hard Disk: 60 GB
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
feature_bullets: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail.
The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features.
All-new features include remastered art and effects, volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, screen-space reflections, and more.
